title: Bug 116744 - Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: When using a dynamic text element to display the contents of a field with three types of content (HTML text within <html> tag, HTML fragments not within <html> tag, and text with RTF tags), the dynamic text content is not being rendered as expected.
SR: To reproduce this issue:1. Create a database field with three types of content: a) HTML text within <html> tags, b) HTML fragments not within <html> tags, and c) Text with RTF tags.2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.3. Observe that the dynamic text content is not rendered as expected.
